snippet: President Obama said he did not believe that North Korea had the ability to miniaturize a nuclear weapon, and he added he would not “reward” the North for provocative acts.
abstract: Pres Obama says he does not believe that North Korea has ability to miniaturize nuclear weapon to fit atop missile, adding that he will not 'reward' North for provocative acts.

byline.original: By DAVID E. SANGER and MICHAEL R. GORDON
byline.contributor: Choe Sang-Hun contributed reporting from Seoul, South Korea.

lead_paragraph: President Obama said he did not believe that North Korea had the ability to miniaturize a nuclear weapon, and he added he would not “reward” the North for provocative acts.

headline.seo: Obama Voices Doubts on North Korean Nuclear Warhead
headline.main: Obama Doubts That North Korea Can Make a Nuclear Warhead
headline.print_headline: Obama Doubts That North Korea Can Make a Nuclear Warhead
